item.title: Callista Industries Ltd Stock Hits Record High of Rs.118 on 2 Jan 2026
item.description: Callista Industries Ltd reached a new all-time high of Rs.118 today, underscoring a remarkable phase of sustained gains and robust market performance. This milestone reflects the company’s strong momentum over recent months, highlighted by significant returns and consistent upward movement across key technical indicators. Time: 4 minutes ago

item.title: Sensex Advances 0.55% Led by Midcaps; Coal India Tops Large Cap Gainers
item.description: Indian equity markets advanced on 2 January 2026, with the Sensex rising 470.70 points or 0.55% to close at 85,659.30, driven by robust midcap performance and broad sectoral participation. The Nifty50 mirrored this optimism, supported by strong gains in public sector undertakings and energy stocks, while FMCG lagged. Market breadth was healthy, with advances outnumbering declines by more than twofold across the BSE500, signalling broad-based buying interest amid mixed global cues. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: Swiggy Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Market Signals
item.description: Swiggy Ltd witnessed a significant 20.96% rise in open interest in its derivatives segment on 1 Jan 2026, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite this surge, the stock underperformed its sector and broader indices, reflecting cautious sentiment amid bearish technical indicators and a recent downgrade to a Strong Sell rating. Time: 1 hour ago
